Sentencas: Power-to-Gas (P2G) is considered as a promising energy storage technology in a long-time horizon.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: The rapid growth in the share of intermittent renewables in the energy mix is driving forward research and development in large-scale energy storage.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: This paper presents a feasibility analysis of a power-to-gas system in terms of various operating points and capacities.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: The analysis was performed using a system model, which features a solid oxide electrolyzer (SOE), a CO2 separation unit, and a methanation reactor as the key components.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: For the purposes of the techno-economic assessment (TEA) of the system, the CAPEX/OPEX estimation was performed and the cost structure defined.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: The model proposed in the study enables system-level optimization, including technical and economic criteria, considering two nominal scales: 10 kW and 40 GW, which corresponds to the nominal capacity of SOE in each case.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: According to the study, in an SOE-based P2G system, the cost of synthetic natural gas (SNG) production will fall by 15-21% by 2030 and 29-37% by 2050.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: SNG production would cost 3.15-3.75 EUR2023/kg(SNG) in 2030 and 2.6-3.0 EUR2023/kg(SNG) in 2050 for systems with SOE power >10 MW.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: Generally, product cost reductions occur as a result of material development and large-scale production, which influences the system's CAPEX.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: According to the research, the technology will break even by 2050.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)

Sentencas: The large-scale power-to-gas system with a total of 40 GW installed capacity delivers a product price of 2.4 EUR2023/kg(SNG) with the average conversion efficiency of 68%.
Titulo: Feasibility study and techno-economic assessment of power-to-gas (P2G) technology based on solid oxide electrolysis (SOE)
